snippet: The authorities said Nashaly Perez Rodriguez left the Lillian L. Rashkis School in Brooklyn on Monday and was still missing.
abstract: Authorities say 15-year-old Nashaly Perez Rodriguez, who disappeared from Lillian L Rashkis School in Brooklyn, is still missing after three days; Education Department says principal of special needs school has been removed following disappearance, which comes almost one year after autistic teenager Avonte Oquendo ran out of unguarded exit at his Queens school.
lead_paragraph: The authorities said Nashaly Perez Rodriguez left the Lillian L. Rashkis School in Brooklyn on Monday and was still missing.

headline.main: Girl, 15, Disappears From a Special-Needs School
headline.print_headline: Girl, 15, Disappears From a Special-Needs School
